function.description: Evaluate arithmetic or mathematical expressions provided as strings.
function.name: evaluate_expression

function.description: Evaluate trigonometric expressions and solve trigonometric equations provided as strings which can contain multiple expressions separated by commas or semicolons.
function.name: evaluate_trigonometric

expression.description: The trigonometric expression or equation to evaluate. Expressions can be separated by commas or semicolons.

variable_values.description: A dictionary containing variable values to substitute, if any.

function.description: Evaluate and solve algebraic expressions and equations provided as strings which can contain multiple expressions separated by commas or semicolons.
function.name: evaluate_algebra

expression.description: The algebraic expression or equation to evaluate. Expressions can be separated by commas or semicolons.

variable_values.description: A dictionary containing variable values to substitute, if any.
